SQL installation error on linux : GLIBC_2.27 not found
item.description: Error /opt/mssql/bin/sqlservr: /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.27' not found (required by /opt/mssql/bin/sqlservr) Initial setup of Microsoft SQL Server failed. Please consult the ERRORLOG in /var/opt/mssql/log for more information. Solution sudo apt-get install mssql-server=15.0.4023.6-2 sudo systemctl start mssql-server
